name: P2B â€” Place From Schematic
description: Maps schematic symbol positions to PCB footprints with collision-free closest-fit placement and a local optimiser.
description_full: KiCad 9 action plugin. Modeless GUI; auto/slider scale; selection-only mode; optional rotation; collision avoidance with clearance and grid step; optimiser tries small position and rotation deltas to reduce target distance. Parses hierarchical schematics.
author: Alexis Devillard
